createProxy(address,bool,bytes).details: The desired implementation serves as a protection against (unintentional) front-running of upgrades

params.desiredImplementation: Address of the implementation contract expected to be registered in the factory during proxy creation
params.trailingData: Metadata to be attached to every call passing through the new proxy
params.upgradeable: If true, the proxy will be an instance of the BeaconProxy. If false, a minimal meta proxy will be deployed

returns._0: The address of the new proxy

params.proxy: Address of the proxy to query

returns.config: The proxy's configuration, including current implementation

returns._0: The length of the proxy list array

returns.list: An array containing the slice of the proxy list

returns._0: True if the address is a proxy

setImplementation(address).details: Upgrades all existing BeaconProxies to the new logic immediately

params.newImplementation: Address of the new implementation contract

setUpgradeAdmin(address).details: For creating non upgradeable factories, or to finalize all upgradeable proxies to current implementation,set the admin to zero address.If setting to address zero, make sure the implementation contract is already set

createProxy(address,bool,bytes).notice: A permissionless funtion to deploy new proxies

getProxyListLength().notice: Fetch the length of the deployed proxies list

getProxyListSlice(uint256,uint256).notice: Get a slice of the deployed proxies array

implementation().notice: Address of the implementation contract, which the deployed proxies will delegate-call to

isProxy(address).notice: Check if an address is a proxy deployed with this factory

proxyList(uint256).notice: An array of addresses of all the proxies deployed by the factory

setUpgradeAdmin(address).notice: Transfer admin rights to a new address

upgradeAdmin().notice: Address of the account authorized to upgrade the implementation contract
